short_description: This tool resolves topological errors and inconsistencies associated with digitized vector streams.
help: This tool resolves topological errors and inconsistencies associated with digitized vector streams.

parameters.name: Input Vector Lines
parameters.description: Name of the input lines vector file.

parameters.name: Output Lines
parameters.description: Name of the output lines vector file.

parameters.name: Reverse backward arcs?
parameters.description: Optional flag to request that arcs that can be proven to be backwards have their direction reversed.

parameters.name: Correct non-confluence joins?
parameters.description: Optional flag to request that non-confluence joins be corrected.
